skillTree.name: Oath of Forging
skillTree.description: To fire the forges and bring true craft and artifice back into the world.

skillTree.name: Obdurate
skillTree.description: All Dwarfs are stubborn, but none more so than Grudgebearer, the founder of the Age of Reckoning.

effects.description:
Weapon strength: +10% for Lords and embedded Heroes
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Lord of the Deeps
skillTree.description: A true Lord knows the Underway, his Dwarfhold and how to fight under the ground better than anyone.

effects.description:
Leadership: +10 during subterranean siege battles
	(Lord's army)

Leadership: +10 during subterranean intercept battles
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Obstinacy
skillTree.description: This stubborn Dwarf refuses to yield or tire, and ensures his followers are of the same ilk.

skillTree.name: Brass-Lunged
skillTree.description: This Lord belts out orders and can be heard even across a battlefield smothered in the grim noise of war.

skillTree.name: Rune of Grimnir
skillTree.description: The endless courage of the Warrior God, directed to bolster this Dawi’s own reserves.

skillTree.name: Immortality
skillTree.description: Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say no…

effects.description: When normally killed in battle, this Lord will be wounded instead

skillTree.name: Full Plate Armour
skillTree.description: Full-Plate armour protects the wearer from head-to-foot. Many such suits are blessed or imbued with arcane abilities.

skillTree.name: Resolute
skillTree.description: Dwarfs are resolute - once they commit to charging the foe, they put all their strength behind that initial blow.

skillTree.name: Hard to Hit
skillTree.description: Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.

skillTree.name: Scarred Veteran
skillTree.description: The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.

skillTree.name: Ancestral Grudge
skillTree.description: All Dwarfs despise the Greenskins, for the urki and grobi are the prime agents in the Times of Woe.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +7% when fighting against Greenskins
Weapon strength: +7% when fighting against Skaven
Weapon strength: +15% when fighting against Greenskins
Weapon strength: +15% when fighting against Skaven

skillTree.name: Wound-Maker
skillTree.description: Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.

skillTree.name: Blade Master
skillTree.description: This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.

skillTree.name: Blade Shield
skillTree.description: A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.

skillTree.name: Relentless
skillTree.description: Dwarfs are not fast, yet they will soldier on, always moving despite any hazards encountered.

skillTree.name: Deadly Onslaught
skillTree.description: The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.

skillTree.name: Venerate Grungni
skillTree.description: Grungni is the Ancestor God of Mining and Stoneworking, and is considered the principal deity of the Dwarf ancestor gods.

effects.description: Chance of intercepting an army using the Underway, beast-paths or Worldroots: +10%

Upkeep: -10% for Miners, Ironbreakers, Dwarf Engineers and Irondrakes units
	(Lord's army)

Ammunition: +100% for Dwarf Miners and Ironbreakers units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Venerate Valaya
skillTree.description: Valaya is the Ancestor Goddess of Home and Healing, wife of Grungni and Grimnir.

effects.description:
Magic resistance: 5% for all units
	(Lord's army)

Attrition: -30% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Venerate Grimnir
skillTree.description: Grimnir is the Ancestor God of Warriors, and slayers in particular.

skillTree.name: Venerate Gazul
skillTree.description: Gazul is the Ancestor God of Underearth and the Dwarf protector of the dead. Gazul's cult seeks out and purges the undead wherever its taint is found.

effects.description:
Weapon strength: +10% when fighting against Vampire Counts
	(Lord's army)

Upkeep: -10% for Great Axe and Hammerer Infantry units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Venerate Smednir
skillTree.description: Smednir is the Ancestor God of of metalworking and ore refinement, creator of many great magical rune weapons including Ghal Maraz.

effects.description:
Upkeep: -10% for Warriors, Longbeards, Hammerers, and Ironbreakers units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Venerate Thungni
skillTree.description: Thungni is the Ancestor God of Runesmithing, and brought the secrets of Runic magic to the Dwarf race.

effects.description:
Enemy Winds of Magic power reserve: -20
	(local region)

Upkeep: -10% for Lords and Heroes
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Venerate Morgrim
skillTree.description: Morgrim is the Ancestor God of Engineers, developing the first bolt and stone throwers of the Dwarves.

effects.description:
Construction time: -1 for Province Capital/Settlement buildings
	(local province)

Upkeep: -10% for Artillery, Gyrocopters, and Gyrobombers units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Inspiring Presence
skillTree.description: There are Lords that radiate power, confidence and fear, inspiring their followers to great or terrible acts.

skillTree.name: Axe Lord
skillTree.description: A Lord and his az are never separated, for it is as much part of him as his beard.

effects.description:
Melee defence: +2 for Miners, Dwarf Warriors, and Longbeards units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +4 for Miners, Dwarf Warriors, and Longbeards units
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +4 for Miners, Dwarf Warriors, and Longbeards units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +6 for Miners, Dwarf Warriors, and Longbeards units
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +6 for Miners, Dwarf Warriors, and Longbeards units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Tactician
skillTree.description: Dwarfs are long-lived with many years of battlefield experience, making them excellent tacticians.

effects.description:
Ammunition: +10% for Quarrellers, Thunderers, and Rangers units
	(Lord's army)

Ammunition: +15% for Quarrellers, Thunderers, and Rangers units
	(Lord's army)

Missile strength: +5% for Quarrellers, Thunderers and Rangers units
	(Lord's army)

Ammunition: +20% for Quarrellers, Thunderers, and Rangers units
	(Lord's army)

Missile strength: +10% for Quarrellers, Thunderers and Rangers units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Tradition & Innovation
skillTree.description: The Dawi continually push the boundaries of engineering, be it by soaring ever higher in their flying contraptions or firing projectiles farther than ever before.

effects.description:
Ammunition: +10% for Bolt Throwers, Gyrocopters, and Gyrobombers units
	(Lord's army)

Ammunition: +15% for Bolt Throwers, Gyrocopters, and Gyrobombers units
	(Lord's army)

Range: +5% for Bolt Throwers, Gyrocopters, and Gyrobombers units
	(Lord's army)

Ammunition: +20% for Bolt Throwers, Gyrocopters, and Gyrobombers units
	(Lord's army)

Range: +10% for Bolt Throwers, Gyrocopters, and Gyrobombers units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Fire & Fury
skillTree.description: Only Dwarfen forges burn hotter than those unfortunates caught in the blaze of Dawi ingenuity.

effects.description:
Missile strength: +5% for Irondrakes, Dwarf Engineers and Flame Cannon units
	(Lord's army)

Missile strength: +5% for Irondrakes, Dwarf Engineers and Flame Cannon units
	(Lord's army)

Reload time reduction: +5% for Dwarf Engineers, Irondrakes and Flame Cannon units
	(Lord's army)

Missile strength: +10% for Irondrakes, Dwarf Engineers and Flame Cannon units
	(Lord's army)

Reload time reduction: +10% for Dwarf Engineers, Irondrakes and Flame Cannon units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Grimnir's Heirs
skillTree.description: Full of grim determination, when Dwarfs join battle there is no retreat, only victory or death.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +2 for Slayers, Giant Slayers, Hammerers, and Ironbreakers units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +5% for Slayers, Giant Slayers, Hammerers, and Ironbreakers units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +4 for Slayers, Giant Slayers, Hammerers, and Ironbreakers units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +10% for Slayers, Giant Slayers, Hammerers, and Ironbreakers units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +6 for Slayers, Giant Slayers, Hammerers, and Ironbreakers units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Thunderer
skillTree.description: This Lord knows his throng thrives in ranged combat and expects his Clansdwarfs to excel in that discipline.

effects.description:
Missile strength: +5% for Grudge Thrower, Cannon and Organ Gun units
	(Lord's army)

Ammunition: +10% for Grudge Thrower, Cannon, and Organ Gun units
	(Lord's army)

Missile strength: +5% for Grudge Thrower, Cannon and Organ Gun units
	(Lord's army)

Ammunition: +20% for Grudge Thrower, Cannon, and Organ Gun units
	(Lord's army)

Missile strength: +10% for Grudge Thrower, Cannon and Organ Gun units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Blessed by Grungni
skillTree.description: Those who pass the trials of the Ancestor God have proven their honour without question.

effects.description:
Armour: +12 for Miners, Dwarf Warriors, and Longbeards units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +5 for Miners, Dwarf Warriors, and Longbeards units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Magic resistance: 15% for Miners, Dwarf Warriors, and Longbeards units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Dawi Firepower
skillTree.description: None know the strength of the Dawi better than those who've suffered their firepower firsthand.

effects.description:
Missile resistance: 15% for Quarrellers, Thunderers, Rangers, Dwarf Engineers, Irondrakes, Gyrocopter, and Gyrobomber units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Missile strength: +10% for Quarrellers, Thunderers, Rangers, Dwarf Engineers, Irondrakes, Gyrocopter and Gyrobomber units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Reload time reduction: +10% for Quarrellers, Thunderers, Rangers, Dwarf Engineers, Irondrakes, Gyrocopter, and Gyrobomber units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Honoured by Grimnir
skillTree.description: All Dwarfs worship Grimnir, but only a select few warriors receive his personal recognition.

effects.description:
Physical resistance: 10% for Slayers, Giant Slayers, Hammerers, and Ironbreakers units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +10% for Slayers, Giant Slayers, Hammerers, and Ironbreakers units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +5 for Slayers, Giant Slayers, Hammerers, and Ironbreakers units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Morgrim’s Favoured
skillTree.description: Morgrim's favour is not handed out on a whim; this god blesses only the truest disciples of Dawi engineering.

effects.description:
Missile strength: +10% for Bolt Thrower, Grudge Thrower, Cannon, Organ Gun and Flame Cannon units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Reload time reduction: +10% for Bolt Thrower, Grudge Thrower, Cannon, Organ Gun, and Flame Cannon units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Ammunition: +20% for Bolt Thrower, Grudge Thrower, Cannon, Organ Gun, and Flame Cannon units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Route Marcher
skillTree.description: Those who know the land and its secrets will travel faster and further than the foes who don't.

skillTree.name: Miner's Instinct
skillTree.description: This Dwarf spent time in the pits, gaining a Miner's intuition of the dangers and prey to be found in the dark.

effects.description: Chance of intercepting an army using the Underway, beast-paths or Worldroots: +6%
Chance of intercepting an army using the Underway, beast-paths or Worldroots: +16%
Chance of intercepting an army using the Underway, beast-paths or Worldroots: +30%

skillTree.name: Wall Breaker
skillTree.description: "I have seen better lavatory walls than this - I'll have it down by the morrow, that's a pledge!"

effects.description:
Attrition suffered by defender: +8% when laying siege
	(local region)

Attrition suffered by defender: +15% when laying siege
	(local region)

skillTree.name: Pure-Beard
skillTree.description: A Dwarf with a fine beard is as Dawi as they come.

skillTree.name: Mason
skillTree.description: Lords close to the powerful Masons' Guild will get discounts for labour and materials.

effects.description:
Construction cost: -3% for Province Capital/Settlement buildings
	(local region)

Construction cost: -1% for all buildings
	(local region)

Construction cost: -6% for Province Capital/Settlement buildings
	(local region)

Construction cost: -3% for all buildings
	(local region)

Construction cost: -10% for Province Capital/Settlement buildings
	(local region)

Construction cost: -5% for all buildings
	(local region)

skillTree.name: Iron-Willed
skillTree.description: Such a Dawi does not care for being wounded - by his will alone he continues to fight.

effects.description:
Casualty replenishment rate: +30% for Lords
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Lightning Strike
skillTree.description: "The time to strike is now!"

effects.description: Enables lightning strike battles when reinforcements are present

skillTree.name: Reassuring Presence
skillTree.description: The presence of this Lord ensures a measure of calm, reducing panic and desertion amongst followers.

effects.description:
Attrition: -3% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

Attrition: -8% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

Attrition: -15% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Inspirational Leader
skillTree.description: "All Dwarfs to me! We have grudges to settle - Grimnir demands it!"

skillTree.name: Alert
skillTree.description: Countless conflicts and a keen sense of awareness have made this Lord difficult to entrap.

effects.description: Chance of intercepting an army using the Underway, beast-paths or Worldroots: +5%
Chance of intercepting an army using the Underway, beast-paths or Worldroots: +10%

skillTree.name: Enquiring Mind
skillTree.description: A wise Lord will gather Engineers to his service, ensuring the Dwarfs maintain their technological edge.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +10% chance of wounding aggressors

skillTree.name: Maintenance
skillTree.description: FACTIONWIDE: all source of income: -0,5% and characters upkeep: +1%. Effects are additive. Negated on level 30 of character.

backgroundSkills.name: Ancestral Blood - Grimnir
backgroundSkills.description: This brave Dawi can trace his lineage back to Grimnir, the Warrior-God.

backgroundSkills.name: Ancestral Blood - Grungni
backgroundSkills.description: This industrious Dawi can trace his lineage back to Grungni, God of Mines and Smiths.

effects.description:
Chance of intercepting an army using the Underway, beast-paths or Worldroots: +10%
	(Heroes in local region)

Construction cost: -5% for all buildings
	(local province)

backgroundSkills.name: Ancestral Blood - Valaya
backgroundSkills.description: This loyal Dawi can trace his lineage back to Valaya, Goddess of Healing and Protection.

effects.description:
Casualty replenishment rate: +5%
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.name: Fleet-Footed
backgroundSkills.description: Being fleet of foot is useful in a fight… or when trying to get away afterwards!

backgroundSkills.name: Cunning
backgroundSkills.description: Deceit is a perfectly acceptable means of attack.

backgroundSkills.name: Determined
backgroundSkills.description: Having a modicum of resolve is useful in a world that continually tests it.

backgroundSkills.name: Confident
backgroundSkills.description: Self-belief is a fine thing when not misplaced.

backgroundSkills.name: Disciplined
backgroundSkills.description: Always in control, this one leaves no stone unturned and nothing to chance.

backgroundSkills.name: Perceptive
backgroundSkills.description: Although actually reading minds is not in their skillset, this one has extraordinary insight into the motives of others.

backgroundSkills.name: Aggressive
backgroundSkills.description: If you're gonna die, you may as well die with your boots on.

backgroundSkills.name: Tough
backgroundSkills.description: Rugged, resistant, and almost unbreakable, this being can and will take on all comers.

backgroundSkills.name: Strong
backgroundSkills.description: Well built, robust. Powerful.

backgroundSkills.name: Weapon Master
backgroundSkills.description: If you can swing, slash, stab, gouge, or shoot it, this warrior has mastered every aspect of its use.

backgroundSkills.name: Strategist
backgroundSkills.description: This being has a plan - not just a game plan, but a master plan to achieve their long-term aims.

backgroundSkills.name: Tactician
backgroundSkills.description: Careful planning, knowledge of the terrain and the weaknesses of the enemy are the key to victory.

effects.description:
Recruit rank: +1 for all units
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.name: Ancestral Blood - Gazul
backgroundSkills.description: Even in the time of the Ancestor Gods, Gazul pondered long on the mortality of his race.

effects.description: Melee attack: +10 when fighting against Vampire Counts, Vampire Coast and Tomb Kings

backgroundSkills.name: Ancestral Blood - Morgrim
backgroundSkills.description: Morgrim was the first Dwarf Engineer. He developed and taught his clans the techniques of crafting engines of war and other devices.

effects.description:
Ammunition: +15% for all missile units
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.name: Ancestral Blood - Smednir
backgroundSkills.description: Smednir is a Dwarf deity of some importance, because of his patronage of metalworking and the refining of ore.

effects.description:
Recruitment cost: -10% for all units
	(local armies)

backgroundSkills.name: Ancestral Blood - Thungni
backgroundSkills.description: The younger son of Grungni and Valaya, Thungni is the god of Runic magic and runesmithing.

effects.description:
Magic item drop chance: +25%
	(Heroes in local region)

Upkeep: -5% for Lords and Heroes
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.name: Grobi Slayer
backgroundSkills.description: Greenskins don't deserve to live longer than a fly.

effects.description:
Weapon strength: +15% when fighting against Greenskins
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.name: Thaggoraki Slayer
backgroundSkills.description: Skaven will die for our brothers lost in the deep tunnels!

effects.description:
Weapon strength: +15% when fighting against Skaven
	(all units in army)
